summary: An Argonian Vampire Eye Replacer - Designed to Match the Dawnguard Vampire Eyes.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/04qks5tftmesmxz/banner.png[/img]

[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/its547hogas86jq/1.png[/img]

[size=3]AVEDG is an Argonian Vampire Eye texture replacer, designed so that Argonian players can have the cool Dawnguard vampire eyes that Bethesda decided the beast races didn\'t need (thanks for that Bethesda)

Based on the awesome DG vampire eyes by Xenius - Texture is 512x512.

[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/5pyufsysvtrb7ph/2.png[/img]

[b]0.01[/b]
* Initial Release - Argonian DG Vampire Eye Replacer.

[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/du3r4sw0icj5igi/3.png[/img]

[u]Automated[/u] 
Load the Mod archive using tannin42\'s Mod Organizer for optimal results.
Can also be used with NMM (if you wish).

[u]Manual[/u]
Drag the textures folder from the archive into the data folder in your Skyrim installation\'s root.

[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/1hepeo2avpqiytx/4.png[/img]

Conflicts with any mods that change the Argonian Vampire Eye Textures.
Will work fine with anything else.

[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ynya7qy0qym8kf4/5.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21839]XCE - Dawnguard[/url] By Xenius - Since this mod is based on his open source textures, it fits perfectly.
	
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23375]Dawnguard Glowing Vampire Eye Fix - All Races By Ryeong[/url] - Adds in the glow effect for the vampire eyes (not added in this mod so as to not conflict)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1334]Mod Organizer By Tannin[/url] - The best mod loader ever created. Seriously, Give it a whirl; its pretty boss.

[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/bmrqjfvlihw9nsr/6.png[/img]

Thanks to Xenius for letting the community, and more specifically giving me permission to use his textures, which this mod is based on.

Thanks to Bethesda for making all of the Elder Scrolls games so awesome; lets hope that when TES: VI comes out, PC users will get the DLC at the same time as the console dudes.[/size]
author: Willock
